file_insights.changes_made: Added avatar validation test case for unknown inspector
file_insights.significance: Extends existing null createdBy test to verify avatar rendering with 'U' character for unknown inspector
file_insights.test_coverage_improvement: Validates both text display and avatar initialization for edge case

patterns_discovered.description: Component uses first letter of display name (e.g., 'U' from 'Unknown Inspector') for avatar display
patterns_discovered.context: InspectionHistoryTimeline handles null createdBy by falling back to 'Unknown Inspector' text, which also generates avatar character

patterns_discovered.description: Component gracefully handles missing creator information with fallback text
patterns_discovered.context: Edge case test verifies both text rendering and derived avatar character

patterns_discovered.description: Tests verify multiple aspects of component behavior (text presence and avatar rendering)
patterns_discovered.context: Single test case validates both display text and derived UI element

gotchas_discovered.description: Avatar 'U' character is derived from 'Unknown Inspector' text, creating implicit coupling between display text and avatar initialization logic
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Test explicitly validates this coupling to catch regressions if either component changes

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Test assumes avatar query selector availability
gotchas_discovered.description: Test queries by text content 'U' which could match other elements if not carefully scoped
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Test assumes 'U' is unique to avatar component in the rendered timeline

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully enhanced test coverage for null createdBy edge case
approach_outcome.details: Extended existing test to validate both the fallback text 'Unknown Inspector' and the derived avatar character 'U', ensuring complete coverage of the component's error-handling behavior

recommendations.suggestion: Add more specific avatar query selector (e.g., by role or data-testid) instead of relying on text content 'U' to reduce false positives
recommendations.rationale: Improves test stability and clarity of intent when querying avatar element

recommendations.suggestion: Consider extracting avatar validation into a helper function if this pattern repeats across multiple test cases
recommendations.rationale: Reduces duplication and improves maintainability as avatar testing patterns expand

recommendations.suggestion: Add comment explaining why 'U' character maps to 'Unknown Inspector' to clarify the avatar derivation logic
recommendations.rationale: Improves test readability for future maintainers unfamiliar with avatar character generation
